Beacon of Sacrifice.name: Beacon of Sacrifice
Beacon of Sacrifice.fullText:
Valiant Cavalier Attack 11Beacon of Sacrifice

You expend a portion of your vitality to send a flashing burst of radiant energy spilling across your enemies, searing them even as your sacrifice lends strength to your allies.

Encounter        Divine, Radiant, Weapon
Standard Action      Close burst 1

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier radiant damage.

Effect: You can choose to take 10 damage (this damage ignores your immunities and resistances). If you do so, each ally within 2 squares of you gains resist 10 to all damage until the start of your next turn.


Published in Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, page(s) 142.
Beacon of Sacrifice.flavor: You expend a portion of your vitality to send a flashing burst of radiant energy spilling across your enemies, searing them even as your sacrifice lends strength to your allies.
Beacon of Sacrifice.effect: You can choose to take 10 damage (this damage ignores your immunities and resistances). If you do so, each ally within 2 squares of you gains resist 10 to all damage until the start of your next turn.

Banner of Sacrifice.name: Banner of Sacrifice
Banner of Sacrifice.fullText:
Valiant Cavalier Utility 12Banner of Sacrifice

A banner of divine energy, stained with blood, appears over you, symbolizing the sacrifice you make to fortify your allies.

Daily        Aura, Divine, Healing
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You activate an aura 2 that lasts until the end of the encounter. Whenever you take 20 or more damage from a single attack, each bloodied ally in the aura regains 5 hit points.


Published in Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, page(s) 142.
Banner of Sacrifice.flavor: A banner of divine energy, stained with blood, appears over you, symbolizing the sacrifice you make to fortify your allies.
Banner of Sacrifice.effect: You activate an aura 2 that lasts until the end of the encounter. Whenever you take 20 or more damage from a single attack, each bloodied ally in the aura regains 5 hit points.

Burden of Sacrifice.name: Burden of Sacrifice
Burden of Sacrifice.fullText:
Valiant Cavalier Attack 20Burden of Sacrifice

Radiant energy flares around you as you land a punishing blow on your enemy. Then, as part of your sacrifice, the energy streams out of you, taking a portion of your vitality to deliver health to your allies.

Daily        Divine, Healing, Radiant, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 5[W] + Strength modifier radiant damage.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: For each ally you choose within 5 squares of you, you can spend a healing surge but regain no hit points. Instead, that ally regains hit points equal to your healing surge value. If you spend at least one healing surge in this way, you gain resist 10 to all damage until the end of the encounter.


Published in Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, page(s) 143.
Burden of Sacrifice.flavor: Radiant energy flares around you as you land a punishing blow on your enemy. Then, as part of your sacrifice, the energy streams out of you, taking a portion of your vitality to deliver health to your allies.
Burden of Sacrifice.effect: For each ally you choose within 5 squares of you, you can spend a healing surge but regain no hit points. Instead, that ally regains hit points equal to your healing surge value. If you spend at least one healing surge in this way, you gain resist 10 to all damage until the end of the encounter.

Beacon of Valor.name: Beacon of Valor
Beacon of Valor.fullText:
Valiant Cavalier Attack 11Beacon of Valor

You raise your weapon and shout your defiance at your foes, hammering them with the divine force of your resolve as your allies redouble their efforts.

Encounter        Divine, Fear, Radiant, Weapon
Standard Action      Close burst 1

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier radiant damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Each ally in the burst gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.


Published in Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, page(s) 146.
Beacon of Valor.flavor: You raise your weapon and shout your defiance at your foes, hammering them with the divine force of your resolve as your allies redouble their efforts.
Beacon of Valor.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier radiant damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Beacon of Valor.effect: Each ally in the burst gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Banner of Valor.name: Banner of Valor
Banner of Valor.fullText:
Valiant Cavalier Utility 12Banner of Valor

A banner of divine energy appears over you, channeling your fighting prowess into inspiration for your allies’ attacks and defenses.

Daily        Aura, Divine
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You activate an aura 2 that lasts until the end of the encounter. Whenever you hit an enemy with an attack, each ally in the aura gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and all defenses until the end of your next turn.


Published in Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, page(s) 147.
Banner of Valor.flavor: A banner of divine energy appears over you, channeling your fighting prowess into inspiration for your allies’ attacks and defenses.
Banner of Valor.effect: You activate an aura 2 that lasts until the end of the encounter. Whenever you hit an enemy with an attack, each ally in the aura gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Burden of Valor.name: Burden of Valor
Burden of Valor.fullText:
Valiant Cavalier Attack 20Burden of Valor

Your weapon becomes a brand of radiant energy as you strike your foe. Divine power swirls around you, compelling your enemy to enter a duel against you.

Daily        Divine, Radiant, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 5[W] + Strength modifier radiant damage.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target, and the target takes a -5 penalty to attack rolls against all creatures other than you. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter or until you end your turn without having attacked the target during that turn.


Published in Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, page(s) 147.
Burden of Valor.flavor: Your weapon becomes a brand of radiant energy as you strike your foe. Divine power swirls around you, compelling your enemy to enter a duel against you.
Burden of Valor.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target, and the target takes a -5 penalty to attack rolls against all creatures other than you. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter or until you end your turn without having attacked the target during that turn.
